product_details.description: MASESTER® E7000 is a versatile, palm-based ingredient derived from fractionated fatty acids (mainly caprylic and capric acids) and refined glycerine. product_details.description: MASBLEN® 2202 is a versatile ingredient that functions as an emulsifier, stabilizer, and texturizing agent. Made for Food and Nutrition applications, it provides desirable standup, creamy mouthfeel, and enhanced melt resistance, particularly beneficial for soft-serve ice cream. See below for recipe and other information.

product_details.description: MASBLEN 3102 is an emulsifier, stabilizer, and texturizing agent for use in Food and Nutrition applications. It provides exceptional aeration and delivers an exceedingly smooth and creamy texture, good body, and melt-resistant qualities. Experience the remarkable texture-enhancing capabilities of MASBLEN 3102 in your food products.

product_details.description: MASBLEN® 1202 is a remarkable powder blend of food-grade Emulsifiers and Stabilizers. It can also function as a texturizing agent. Derived from non-animal, non-GMO sources, it excels in ice cream and milk ice recipes. Safeguard your creations during distribution and storage with MASBLEN® 1202, preventing heat shock damage, curbing coarse ice crystal growth, and preserving optimal texture.
product_details.Labeling Claims: PHO (Partially Hydrogenated Oil)-Free, Halal, Kosher, Non-GMO

product_details.description: MASBLEN® 6801 is a specialized emulsifier with features that include improved mouthfeel and fat reduction. Its Food and Nutrition applications include creating reduced-fat, egg-free mayonnaise. MASBLEN® 6801 contributes essential emulsification properties and enhances the mouthfeel of mayonnaise, even in reduced-fat formulations.
product_details.Labeling Claims: Non-GMO, Halal, Kosher

product_details.description: MASBLEN® 2102 is a skillfully crafted blend of food-grade emulsifiers and stabilizers in powder form. Derived from non-animal, non-GMO sources, this product is tailored for incorporation into soft-serve ice cream dry mix. Its remarkable attributes include superior melt resistance, shape retention, and a luxuriously smooth and creamy texture. Elevate your sensory journey with enhanced standup and elegant fluting characteristics, all courtesy of MASBLEN® 2102.

product_details.description: MASBLEN® 5102 is a powder blend of food-grade emulsifiers and stabilizers. It provides a uniform suspension of plant-based proteins and other insoluble particles and improves emulsion stability, reducing the tendency for creaming. This product is a versatile functional system for use in UHT-alternative beverages such as UHT oat soymilk and calcium-fortified matcha soymilk.
product_details.Features: Prevents Fat Separation, Heat Stability, Consistent Suspension, Improved suspension, Improved Mouthfeel, Emulsifying

product_details.description: MASBLEN 6151 is a purpose-built functional blend of meticulously chosen emulsifiers and hydrocolloids. Tailored for dairy-free and protein-free whipped topping applications, it excels in delivering remarkable foam stability and syneresis control. It also provides enhanced freeze-thaw stability, minimal shrinkage, and reduced syneresis.

MASEMUL® DMG 9502 is a versatile ingredient used in margarine, bakery products, and coffee whiteners. It acts as an emulsifier and extrusion aid, contributing to the quality and performance of various food products.
